{"step_by_step_thinking": "Freud's Phallic stage occurs from ages 3 to 6, during which the child's pleasure center is their genitalia. Piaget's stages of cognitive development are Sensorimotor (0-2 years), Preoperational (2-7 years), Concrete operational (7-11 years), and Formal operational (12 and up). The Phallic stage of Freud corresponds to the age range of the Preoperational stage of Piaget.", "answer_choice": "B. Pre operational"}
